title: Costco signals continued price investment and targets 27 new warehouses in 2025 while expanding digital initiatives
excerpt: Discover Costco's Q3 2025 earnings insights: global expansion, price leadership, digital innovation, and tariff mitigation strategies.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Costco Wholesale Corporation (COST) Q3 2025 Management View CEO Ron Vachris highlighted the company’s expansion, noting, "Since our last earnings call, we've opened nine warehouses, including relocation in Melbourne, Australia, our 37th warehouse in Japan and seven net new U.S. locations. Management View
